mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.province_id AS "province.id", a.city_id AS "city.id", a.region_id AS "region.id", a.pcr_name AS "pcrName", a.address AS "address", a.receiver AS "receiver", a.phone AS "phone", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", su.name as "createBy.name", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate", province.name as "province.name", city.name as "city.name", reg.name as "region.name"

LEFT JOIN sys_region province ON province.id = a.province_id LEFT JOIN sys_region city ON city.id = a.city_id LEFT JOIN sys_region reg ON reg.id = a.region_id left join sys_user su on a.create_id=su.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_order_address( id, province_id, city_id, region_id, pcr_name, address, receiver, phone, status, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{province.id}, #{city.id}, #{region.id}, #{pcrName}, #{address}, #{receiver}, #{phone}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_order_address SET province_id = #{province.id}, city_id = #{city.id}, region_id = #{region.id}, pcr_name = #{pcrName}, address = #{address}, receiver = #{receiver}, phone = #{phone}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
